formula: Complex representation: a(n)=(1/7)*(1-r^n)*sum{1<=k<7, k*product{1<=m<7,m<>k, (1-r^(n-m))}} where r=exp(2*pi/7*i) and i=sqrt(-1).Trigonometric representation: a(n)=(64/7)^2*(sin(n*pi/7))^2*sum{1<=k<7, k*product{1<=m<7,m<>k, (sin((n-m)*pi/7))^2}}.G.f.: g(x)=(sum{1<=k<7, k*x^k})/(1-x^7).Also: g(x)=x(6x^7-7x^6+1)/((1-x^7)(1-x)^2). - _Hieronymus Fischer_, May 31 2007a(n) = floor(41152/3333333*10^(n+1)) mod 10. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jan 03 2013a(n) = floor(7625/274514*7^(n+1)) mod 7. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jan 04 2013
